import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../../index.css' import './NewTODOForm.css' const NewTODOForm = props => { const [enteredTitle, setEnteretTitle] = useState('') const [enteredDate, setEnteretDate] = useState('') const [enteredMessage, setEnteretMessage] = useState('') const [chosenOption, setChosenOption] = useState(0) const [isValidTitle, setIsValidTitle] = useState const titleChangeHandler = event => { setEnteretTitle(event.target.value) } const dateChangeHandler = event => { setEnteretDate(event.target.value) } const messageChangeHandler = event => { setEnteretMessage(event.target.value) } const option1ChangeHandler = () => { setChosenOption(1) } const option2ChangeHandler = () => { setChosenOption(2) } const option3ChangeHandler = () => { setChosenOption(3) } console.log(chosenOption) return (

) } export default NewTODOForm
